Trade/Device Name(s): MDT2 BLE Self-Monitoring Blood Glucose System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MDT2 BLE Self-Monitoring Blood Glucose System with Bluetooth-enabled meter for home blood glucose testing
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, or forearm, for home use by a single patient with diabetes, not for neonates or diagnosis/screening of diabetes, including alternative site testing during steady-state glucose conditions
